transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good. It is surrounded by residential areas. It is very quiet. The newly opened facilities are also very new. The rooms are very clean. The cleaning staff are also very good. They are very qualified and polite. The breakfast is also good and very delicious. Book it now. The price is also very cost-effective, and the price-performance ratio is very high
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
